title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.10 - Cumulative tenure areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.10 - Cumulative tenure areas

State Regulations

Where a professional educator acquires tenure in a tenure
area created by this Subpart, he shall retain such tenure while he remains
continuously employed by the board of education or board of cooperative
educational services as a full-time member of the professional staff of the
district, notwithstanding subsequent appointments to tenure or to probation in
other tenure areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-1.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
